meanings.definition: A disease or disorder of the spinal cord characterized by pain, weakness, or sensory changes.
meanings.sent1: Myelopathies can cause pain and weakness in the spinal cord.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying different treatments for myelopathies.
meanings.sent3: The myelopathies in the storybook all had unique superpowers.
meanings.sent4: Her love for dancing was like a myelopathies, affecting her movements.
meanings.sent5: The dark shadow of myelopathies loomed over his health.
